section.name: Search results for JSON output
section.p: Outputs a JSON results of Fess. You must in order to emit JSON enabled keep JSON response in the General Management screen crawl settings.

subsection.name: Request
subsection.p: To get JSON output http://localhost:8080/Fess/JSON? query = search terms Of these sends a request. Request parameters are as follows.

tr.td: Search language. Pass the URL encoding.
The number of where to start. Starts at 0.
The number of display. The default is 20. You can display up to 100.
The label value. Use to specify the label.
If you use the JSONP callback name. You do not need to specify if you do not use the JSONP.

tr.td: The status of the response. 0, the normal response.
